title: Suma Chakrabarti - Wikipedia
snippet: Sir Sumantra "Suma" Chakrabarti KCB (born 1959) is a British former civil servant who served as president of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) from July 2012 to July 2020.

title: Former EBRD President Sir Suma Chakrabarti
snippet: Sir Suma Chakrabarti was the sixth President of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD).

title: Sir Suma Chakrabarti - GOV.UK
snippet: Suma is also Clerk of the Crown in Chancery, meaning he has custody of the ‘Great Seal of the Realm’ which is used to authorise official documents on behalf of the Queen, and also has certain ceremonial roles in Parliament.

title: Suma Chakrabarti
snippet: Sir Suma Chakrabarti, born in 1959 in West Bengal, India, is the sixth President of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD). The EBRD's Board of Governors re-elected Sir Suma as President of the Bank for a second four-year ...

title: Suma Chakrabarti | ODI: Think change
snippet: Before becoming President of the EBRD, Sir Suma had a successful career in the UK civil service as Permanent Secretary at the Department for International Development (2002-2007) and the Ministry of Justice (2007-2012).
